tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE investor_profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20),
    investment_goal VARCHAR(50)
)
CREATE TABLE investors ( investor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15), birth_date DATE, risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20) )
CREATE TABLE risk_tolerances ( risk_tolerance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, description VARCHAR(50), min_score INT, max_score INT )
CREATE TABLE investment_goals ( goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY, goal_description VARCHAR(100), priority INT, target_amount DECIMAL(12,2) )

CREATE TABLE investor_data (
  investor_id INT REFERENCES investors(investor_id),
  risk_tolerance_id INT REFERENCES risk_tolerances(risk_tolerance_id),
  goal_id INT REFERENCES investment_goals(goal_id),
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investor_profiles (
    investor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(15,2),
    transaction_date DATE
);
